long_description: Protect your valuables from pickpockets and bag slashers with the TravelSafe 12L GII Portable Safe from PacSafe. Its 360-degree eXomesh(R) system locks it closed and to a secure fixture. Padded, lightweight bag packs flat and featues a soft brushed-polyester lining. 360-degree eXomesh locking system is a flexible, stainless-steel wire mesh integrated into the bag to form a stealthy portable safe. Bag can be locked closed, and also locked to a secure fixture in your hotel room, by the pool, in a car or train, or in flight. Sized to hold a laptop up to 15 in. Light-colored interior helps you easily see items inside. TSA-accepted 3-dial combination lock is included. TravelSafe 12L GII Portable Safe from PacSafe features carry handles and is water resistant.
short_description: Protect your valuables from pickpockets and bag slashers with the TravelSafe 12L GII Portable Safe from PacSafe. Its 360-degree eXomesh(R) system locks it closed and to a secure fixture.
